function.description:
Inserts documents into a collection. A robot exception will be generated if the update failed.
The `ordered` parameter indicates whether to perform an ordered insert of the documents. If an error occurs with a document during an ordered insert, the remaining documents will not be inserted. If an error occurs during an unordered insert it will continue processing the remaining documents.
